text: Mam ay sɨkop, yad nɨbop takaw we gɨl yolɨgup anɨb ak nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos nepin. Nɨbi chɨn bɨ gos nɨgep mɨdobun agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb tek lup ak nɨm, takaw we gɨl yolɨgup anɨb ak nɨbop agen, chɨn bɨ gos nɨgep gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Takaw we gɨl yolɨgup anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Yislel binɨb chɨbol kɨlop ak ma asɨkak ak pen, pel anɨb ma gɨnɨgab. Kɨli anɨgɨl mɨd dad amɨl, God ne binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop dɨnɨg nɨg lak okok mɨdupsek dɨnɨgab ñɨn ak.
